author: Jeremy B. White
title: Newsom lays out California piece of West Coast reopening strategy
description: Businesses and schools will need to demonstrate their ability to maintain safe distancing guidelines.
content:
Sacramento | Rich Pedroncelli/AP Photo
OAKLAND California Gov. Gavin Newsom on Tuesday laid out his reopening strategy for the nation's most populous state, envisioning a landscape that could include temperature checks at restaurants and no major sporting ev… [+3755 chars]
